summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific period in January 2016. It includes information about deposits, checks paid, and service charges, as well as instructions for reporting errors in transactions.

keyFacts: The document details account balances for January 2016, showing a beginning balance of $461,170.13 and an ending balance of $461,170.13 after transactions.
A check for $1,300.00 was paid during this period.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees for the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in transactions within specified time frames.
The document is marked as confidential and subject to legal restrictions.
